properties.description: This innovative emulsion combines keratin properties with a unique blend of silicone and elastomeric materials to create a smooth, supple texture that effectively reduces the visibility of skin imperfections. Formulated with a variety of active ingredients, including organopolysiloxanes and specialized pigments, it offers enhanced skin care benefits while providing a radiant, flawless finish.
